title: Education & Training
description: Our comprehensive training programs combine classroom education with real-world scenarios at mock jobsites. Learn best practices, understand utility marking standards, and master the 811 process.

title: Utility Locate Rodeo
description: The Utility Locate Rodeo is an annual competition that showcases the locating profession and encourages best practices among utility locators. This event recognizes excellence and promotes safety.

title: Silver Shovel Awards
description: The Silver Shovel Awards recognize excavators and contractors who demonstrate strong safety ethics and consistent best practices in damage prevention. Celebrate excellence in our industry.

title: 811 Day (August 11)
description: 811 Day is an annual public awareness campaign held on August 11th (8/11) to promote the importance of calling 811 before digging. This nationwide initiative helps prevent utility damage.

title: Golf Tournament Fundraiser
description: The NRCGA Golf Tournament is an annual fundraising event that brings together members of Nevada's damage prevention community for a day of golf, networking, and fun.

title: Craig Rogers Award
description: The Craig Rogers Award honors excellence in damage prevention in memory of our dear friend and colleague. This award celebrates leaders who demonstrate outstanding commitment to safety.

title: 50 in 5
description: The NRCGA has accepted the Common Ground Alliance's 50 in 5 challenge to reduce damages to critical underground utilities by 50% in 5 years. This ambitious initiative drives our strategic planning.

title: Operations
description: The Operations working group plays a critical role in ensuring the effective operation of Nevada's One Call Center system. This group brings together stakeholders to discuss operational improvements.

title: Embedded Facilities Taskforce
description: The Embedded Facilities Taskforce is a technical working group focused on addressing the unique challenges associated with embedded facilities and infrastructure.

title: Budget Committee
description: The Budget Committee oversees NRCGA's financial planning, budget development, and fiscal responsibility to ensure the organization's long-term sustainability.

title: Technical Solutions Committee
description: The Technical Solutions Committee evaluates and develops innovative technologies and methods to improve damage prevention practices across Nevada.
